contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox china station |namerom = Youyi Road |name = 友谊路 |image = Youyi Road Station.JPG |imagesize = |caption = |prov = Shanghai |city = Shanghai |district = |districtname = |open = |close = |oldname = |presentname = |station_number = |operator = Shanghai No.3 Metro Operation Co. Ltd. |line = {{SHM line links|3}} |stats = |statsnote = |coordinates = |services = {{s-rail|title=SHM}} {{s-line|system=SHM|line=3|previous=Tieli Road|next=Baoyang Road}} }} '''Youyi Road''' ({{Zh|s=友谊路站|t=友誼路站|p=Yǒuyì Lù Zhàn}}) is the name of a station on the [[Shanghai Metro]] [[Shanghai Metro Line 3|Line 3]]. This station is part of the northern extension of that line. {{Shanghai Metro |line3=yes }} {{coord|31.4064|N|121.471|E|source:kolossus-zhwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Shanghai Metro stations]] {{Shanghai-metro-stub}} {{Shanghai-railstation-stub}}
